amendment.description: An amendment numbered 92 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used for the Office of Gun Violence Prevention.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 212 (Roll no. 639).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 212 (Roll no. 639).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
